name: ChristmasNaughtyorNicelist
0:
”Alexa, open naughty or nice list”
”Is Isabelle on the nice list”
”Is holly on the naughty list”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: naughty or nice list
des: This app allows you to speak to Santa's naughty or nice department and see which list you are on. Depending on which list you ask to check will depend on the result nice list for nice response. Naughty list for naughty response.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
